product_name: Mountain Hardwear Desna Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Perfect for climbing, the men's Mountain Hardwear Desna Full-Zip Fleece Jacket is warm enough to keep you insulated, supple enough to move with you in the harness. Polyester/spandex hardface fleece stretches, breathes and provides warmth. MicroClimate Zoning(TM) construction places warmth where you want it and ventilation where you need it. Integrated thumbholes provide extra coverage and warmth. Dual hem cords let you make quick adjustments to seal warmth in, weather out. Mountain Hardwear Desna Full-Zip Fleece Jacket for men offers zippered handwarmer pockets and 1 zippered chest pocket.
short_description: Perfect for climbing, the men's Mountain Hardwear Desna Full-Zip Fleece Jacket is warm enough to keep you insulated, supple enough to move with you in the harness.
